entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 07:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
